## Natural history notes

Large Four-spotted Scoliid Wasps (Pygodasis quadrimaculata) with four bright yellow spots on the abdomen of females. The pattern on males can come in a range of slightly different colors. The wings of males may also have a unique wing pattern. They are typically active during Spring and Summer.
